name: Mammut 7mm Nylon Static Cord
description:
7mm nylon cord is useful for prussik knots on larger diameter ropes, equalizing protection, slinging solid-stem friends, and other climbing trickery.Tensile strength of 1325kg.Sold by the metre.

        Sustainability
